analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0x9cb0ad95bc5ba68d0606bc2717bde716cc94ebe2.sol:
	Contract AdlerToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x9cb0ad95bc5ba68d0606bc2717bde716cc94ebe2.sol#214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/19/0x9cb0ad95bc5ba68d0606bc2717bde716cc94ebe2.sol#84) is not in mixedCase
